body:
Hi,
I'll get straight to the point. I made a nightcore music video (just now xD) and shared it with a couple of friends on here. They liked it, and this is what inspired me to make this thread.

EDIT: I've decided to turn this into a music thread, as I find it useless to create a new thread about my music. 

In this thread, I will be updating it with all of my latest music (lyric) videos, lel.

Music (Lyric) Videos:
Imagine Dragons- Shots
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FNYCTfY5Vf0
Imagine Dragons- Dream
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mCEso2B5KoI

Nightcore Videos
Imagine Dragons- Warriors
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PC6uzoNneJk
Imagine Dragons- Warriors (RE-UPLOAD)
No difference in music, but better editing.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J4GTqwtw4vM

Kuba Orms- My Love
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ne_QxskXfUU

Enjoy.
